description.p: ModernDeck is an app/extension running atop TweetDeck that brings a new, Material Design-inspired interface, as well as new customization features.

ul.li: Added NFT Actions: A fine-tuned way to deal with accounts with NFT avatars
Hide in ModernDeck: Just hide users using NFT avatars. This is completely client-side: Your account doesn't perform any actions, and they'll be hidden in ModernDeck.
Mute: Mute the account with the NFT avatar
Block: Block the account with the NFT avatar
Currently not available in Search columns due to Twitter API limitations (A workaround may be added in the future)
Mutes and Blocks act upon your account, queueing NFT avatar users to be blocked or muted
Queue is to avoid hitting API limits and anti-automation measures
Implemented @pixeldesu's Advanced Mute Engine(Currently only used for NFT avatar hiding)
